Welcome To IGNITE 2015
If you are receiving this email it means you are one of the lucky 300 ticket holders for Ignite 2015. This email will detail information about the 8 exciting workshops you can choose from on the day, and some key information you need to know.
Day Schedule
Date: Saturday 28th November Time: Doors open at 12:30 pm and day will finish at 6 pm Where: The College Of North East London (CONEL Tottenham Campus) High Road, London, N15 4RU
Make sure you bring
A light snack (No food will be provided) Water bottle Notepad and pen
Workshops
Please note - you will sign up to one workshop at the start of the day on a first come first serve basis, make sure you get to the event in good time or risk missing out on your first choice!
Workshop 1: My Digital Image
Workshop 2: Iâ€™m Not What You See, I'm Limitless
Workshop 3: We Got This
Workshop 4: Youth Unemployment: What Do You(th) Think?
Workshop 5: Are you worth it?
Workshop 6: Girls Allowed!! "Did you know that in certain countries across the globe girls are being denied their basic human rights of access to an education?
Workshop 7: Mental Health or Mental Illness? What is the difference? "A mental health awareness workshop for young people
Workshop 8: Art in Action
You can find out more information on each of the workshops with a detailed description on the eventbrite page here.
We look forward to seeing you on the day.
